content.rendered:
Directed by Jonathan Brough. Pier Wilkie.

Written by Jonathan Brackley. Jonathan Brackley. Sam Vincent. Sam Vincent. Nick Ahad.

Cast Andrew Buchan (Col McHugh). Samuel Edward-Cook (Ceri Davies). Zak Ford-Williams (Owen Davies). Mark Monero (Curtis ‘Lord’ Roy). Lucy Black (DCI Sandy Mosby). Gavin Spokes (DI Phil Cowper). Olivia Nakintu (DC Esther Okoye). Carolin Stoltz (Alma McHugh). Anthony Lewis (DS Ibbotson). Garry Cooper (Peter ‘Bulgey’ Donovan). Ceallach Spellman (Donal McHugh). Junade Khan (DS Khan). Moe Bar-El (Artem). Joseph Steyne (Joleon). Jamie Dorrington (UPC Officer 1). Anton Lesser (Vernon Marley). Kaya Moore (Noel Wilkes). Florian Rafuna (Thomas Ajazi). Tillie Amartey (Jade Wilkes). Kate Rutter (Juliet Donovan). Chantelle Pierre (Shaheen). Emma Somerville (Gayle). Michal Nowak (Roman). Iona Mckeown (Aoife McHugh). Julie Edwards (Lynne). Souad Faress (Zaara Slack). Twana Omer (Khafiz). Alex Williams (Aftar Malik). Caroline Chesworth (Jenny). Kate Hampson (Rachel). Harry Egan (PC Morgan). Diyar Bozkurt (Mehmet). Emily Pithon (Marta). Liz Simmons (Prison Nurse). Ray Castleton (Old Lag). Charley Webb (Elise). Marva Alexander (Joy Okoye). Asif Khan (Dr Bhaskari). Suanne Braun (Neurologist). Sara Beharrell (Tipsy Mum). Chris Grierson (Physio). Mohammad Sakhi (Rowdy Kid 1). Samir Arrian (Rowdy Kid 2). Simon Naylor (John). Lynn Roden (Vicky Endersley). Tahir Shah (Imam). Rakesh Boury (Personal Officer). Tony Hirst (Howard). Menyee Lai (Doctor). Hopi Grace (Gwen). Zaid Munir (Rashid). Neelam Bakshi (Sidra). Misha Duncan-Barry (Prison Officer). Liz Hume Dawson (Belinda Wilkes). Ali Gadema (Mehmood Zada). David Hartley (Funeral Director). Danny Ryder (Abbott). Akib Ahmed (Adib Malik). Robert Wolfe (UPC Officer 2). Andy M Milligan (Andy – Gastro Pub Customer (uncredited)). Jean-Pascal Heynemand (OCT Officer (uncredited)). Joanne James (Restaurant Birthday Guest (uncredited)). Jack Smith (Waiter (uncredited)). Hamza Butt (Prisoner (uncredited)). Philip Gascoyne (Restaurant Birthday Guest (uncredited)). Neil Swift (Neil (uncredited)). Richard Crehan (O’Connor (uncredited)). Adele Fearn (Neighbour (uncredited))

Language English.

Producers Jonathan Brackley. James Dean. Lucy Dyke. Nawfal Faizullah. Andy Kitching. Mona Qureshi. Jane Featherstone. Chris Fry. Emma Morley. Alice Tyler. Sam Vincent.

Production BBC Studios. British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC). Sister Pictures.

Creators Jonathan Brackley. Sam Vincent.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 5

Status On Going (2023–)
